acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Madison County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Madison County was named for James Madison, a prominent Virginian and a member of Congress in 1792 when the county was formed from Culpeper County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Madison County (Va.) Tax and Fiscal Records, 1815-1965, consist of County Claims, List of Persons Assessed with License Tax, and Poll Tax Lists.
